text:
- AB InBev is one of the
biggest brewers worldwide.
We were looking for a cloud provider

that could scale to meet
the demands that we had.
For example, our ZÃ© Delivery business,

in 2019, we had a
million orders that year,

and in 2020, we had a
million orders a month.
So we needed a cloud platform
that could handle that scale as we grew.

Everything from routing,
delivery optimization,

the actual delivery men,
how they look at the orders,

all of those capabilities are
built and deployed on AWS.
So the reason we build on AWS

is really because of the
innovation that they bring.
We're able to continuously learn
about the latest in technology,
about the latest trends in the market,

we're able to use services
that continue to evolve
and enable our business to grow,

and we can use AWS's capabilities
that are the best in class
when it comes to the e-commerce space

or building an e-commerce
platform, recommendation engines,
these kind of things that allow us

to create a unique
experience for our consumers,
for our businesses that help them to grow
and outpace the competition.
